01.title: Forged in Fire
01.scripture: 1 Peter 1:7 – 'These trials will show that your faith is genuine. It is being tested as fire tests and purifies gold...'
01.devotion: God isn’t trying to burn you—He’s refining you. Just like steel is forged through intense heat, your character is being shaped in the fire. He doesn’t waste the flame.
01.prayer: Lord, I trust that You are refining me, not ruining me. Shape me through the fire.

02.title: Man of Integrity
02.scripture: Proverbs 20:7 – 'The righteous man walks in his integrity; his children are blessed after him.'
02.devotion: Your decisions echo beyond you. When you walk in integrity, you leave a legacy. What you do in secret matters. Be the man your family can trust—even when no one’s watching.
02.prayer: God, help me be consistent in character both in public and in private.

03.title: Strength Under Control
03.scripture: Matthew 5:5 – 'Blessed are the meek, for they will inherit the earth.'
03.devotion: Meekness isn’t weakness—it’s strength under control. A sword in its sheath still has power. You don’t have to prove your worth with volume. Let your restraint speak loudly.
03.prayer: Lord, give me the self-control to be bold without being brutal.

04.title: Builder of Legacy
04.scripture: Psalm 127:1 – 'Unless the Lord builds the house, those who build it labor in vain...'
04.devotion: You’re not just building a life—you’re building a legacy. And unless God is the architect, your work won’t stand. Build with His blueprints, not your ego.
04.prayer: Father, establish the work of my hands. Help me build what lasts.

05.title: Battle-Ready
05.scripture: Ephesians 6:11 – 'Put on the full armor of God so that you can take your stand against the devil’s schemes.'
05.devotion: Life isn’t a vacation—it’s a battleground. But God doesn’t send you into the fight unarmed. Suit up with truth, righteousness, and faith. You’re not just surviving—you’re advancing.
05.prayer: God, clothe me in Your armor today. Train me to stand strong and fight smart.
